casebody.data:
STATE of Connecticut
v.
John Joseph LEPESKA Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided December 6, 2016

Peter G. Billings, assigned counsel, in support of the petition.

Jennifer F. Miller, deputy assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The defendant's petition for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, 169 Conn.App. 135, 149 A.3d 213 (2016), is denied.
